name: Youth Theatre
description: The Marsh Youth Theater (MYT) provides high quality skill-building classes for youth throughout San Francisco. We partner with afterschool programs and community centers to bring Teaching Artists to sites throughout SFUSD, including classes in Storytelling, Creative Dramatics, Hip Hop & World Dance, Afro-Peruvian Dance, Dances of the African Diaspora, “Classical” Theatre (Plays, Playhouses, & Playfulness!), Making Connections through Puppetry, and Digital Storytelling. We also offer Spring & Sum

howToGetIt: MYT Program Director: Rebecca Cervantes 1062 Valencia SF, CA, 94110 E-Mail: myt@themarsh.org
